languages.text: "Правда?.. Признаться, я не возлагал на твой вид больших надежд. Быть может, в чем-то я ошибался".

traits.locale_text: "Правда?.. Признаться, я не возлагал на твой вид больших надежд. Быть может, в чем-то я ошибался".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Really? I must confess, I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."
languages.original_text: "Правда?.. Признаться, я не возлагал на твой вид больших надежд. Быть может, в чем-то я ошибался".

traits.locale_text: "Really? I must confess I have not been placing a lot of hope in your species. Perhaps, in some regards, less than I should have."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Really? I must confess I have not been placing a lot of hope in your species. Perhaps, in some regards, less than I should have."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Really? I must confess, I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Really? I must confess, I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Really? I must confess, I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «¿De veras? He de confesar que en el pasado no he tenido en mucha estima a los de tu especie. Puede que me equivocase y haya honrosas excepciones».
languages.original_text: "Really? I must confess, I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."

traits.locale_text: «¿De veras? He de confesar que en el pasado no he tenido en mucha estima a los de tu especie. Puede que me equivocase y haya honrosas excepciones».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「本当か？正直なところ、私はこれまでお前たちの種族をあまり評価してこなかった。おそらく、いくつかの点でそれは間違っていたのだろう」
languages.original_text: "Really? I must confess, I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「本当か？正直なところ、私はこれまでお前たちの種族をあまり評価してこなかった。おそらく、いくつかの点でそれは間違っていたのだろう」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “真的吗？我以前有点看不起你们的种族，但或许，从某些方面而言，我这样的看法是错误的。”
languages.original_text: "Really? I must confess, I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."

traits.locale_text: “真的吗？我以前有点看不起你们的种族，但或许，从某些方面而言，我这样的看法是错误的。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Vraiment ? Je n'ai fait que peu de cas de votre espèce jusqu'à présent, je dois l'admettre. Peut-être qu'à certains égards, c'était une erreur de ma part. »
languages.original_text: "Really? I must confess, I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? Je n'ai fait que peu de cas de votre espèce jusqu'à présent, je dois l'admettre. Peut-être qu'à certains égards, c'était une erreur de ma part. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Wirklich? Ich muss gestehen, dass ich früher von Eurer Spezies nicht viel hielt. Vielleicht lag ich in mancher Hinsicht falsch."
languages.original_text: "Really? I must confess, I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Wirklich? Ich muss gestehen, dass ich früher von Eurer Spezies nicht viel hielt. Vielleicht lag ich in mancher Hinsicht falsch."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Gerçekten mi? İtiraf etmeliyim, geçmişte türüne neredeyse hiç saygı göstermezdim. Belki de hata etmişimdir."
languages.original_text: "Really? I must confess, I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten mi? İtiraf etmeliyim, geçmişte türüne neredeyse hiç saygı göstermezdim. Belki de bu konuda hatalı davranmışımdır."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
